Tribute/Cover Bands: Events featuring bands that perform as tributes to other famous artists or focus on playing their music.
Original Music/Artist Performances: Concerts and shows where bands and artists perform their own original material.
DJ Sets/Electronic Music: Events focused on disc jockeys (DJs) and electronic music performances.
Comedy/Spoken Word/Other Performances: Events that fall outside typical music concerts, such as comedy shows, spoken word performances, or unique artistic presentations.
Recurring Local Events (Non-Band Specifi: Regularly scheduled local events named after an activity rather than a specific musical act, though music might be part of the event.
